channel.title: Jianbo Jiao - University of Oxford
channel.description: Recent content on Jianbo Jiao - University of Oxford

item.title: About
item.description: I am an Assistant Professor in the School of Computer Science at University of Birmingham, and a Visiting Researcher at the University of Oxford. Before joining Birmingham, I was fortunate to work as a Postdoctoral Researcher in the Biomedical Image Analysis (BioMedIA) group and the Visual Geometry Group (VGG) at the University of Oxford, advised by Prof Alison Noble and Prof Andrew Zisserman. Department of Engineering Science at the University of Oxford, and a member of the Biomedical Image Analysis (BioMedIA) group and the Visual Geometry Group (VGG), advised by Prof.

item.title: Publications

Papageorghiou, Alison Noble (*Equal contribution) European Conference on Computer Vision (ECCV) Medical Computer Vision Workshop, Oral Presentation (Best Paper Award), 2022

item.title: Teaching

item.title: Services
item.description: Associate Editor: IEEE Transactions on Circuits and Systems for Video Technology (T-CSVT) The Visual Computer (International Journal of Computer Graphics) Applied Sciences Special Issue: Advances in Computer Vision and Semantic Segmentation (Guest Editor) Co-Chair / Organizing Committee: 25th UK Conference on Medical Image Understanding and Analysis (MIUA 2021) Area Chair ACM International Conference on Multimedia 2022 (ACM MM) Vision And Learning SEminar (VALSE) Conference Reviewer: ICML 2022 (Outstanding Reviewer), ICLR 2022, CVPR 2022, ACCV 2022 (Outstanding Reviewer), NeurIPS 2021 (Outstanding Reviewer), CVPR 2021 (Outstanding Reviewer), IJCAI 2021 (Senior Program Committee member), AAAI 2021, WACV 2021, CVPR 2020, ECCV 2020 (Outstanding Reviewer), MICCAI 2020 (Outstanding Reviewer), AAAI 2020, IJCAI 2020, ACCV 2020, ICCV 2019 (Outstanding Reviewer), CVPR 2019, MICCAI 2019, Pacific Graphics 2018 Journal Reviewer: IEEE T-PAMI, T-IP, T-MI, T-NNLS, T-CSVT, T-Cybernetics, T-MM, Multimedia, Signal Processing Letters; Springer IJCV, Neurocomputing, Journal of Visual Communication and Image Representation (Outstanding Reviewer), Computer Vision and Image Understanding, Computer Graphics Forum
